LIST_OUTPUT_MESSAGES: OUTPUT_MESSAGE_TYPE_QUEUEDETECTIONALERT to enable Queue Detection Alert based on Crowd Density Local
OUTPUT_MESSAGE_TYPE_CROWDHEATMAPOUTPUT to enable calculation of Crowd Heatmap Based on Wristband Localization
LIST_MQTT_OUTPUT_TYPE: TYPE_CONVERSION_OGCDICTIONARY for External Broker MQTT (e.g. in production Broker MONICA)
